articles.author: Zach Osterman, The Indianapolis Star
articles.title: Osterman: Time to stop acting like NBA coaches, like Mike Woodson, can't cut it in college - IndyStar
articles.description: Malik Reneau is the third player ranked No. 30 or better to commit to IU in the 13 months Mike Woodson has been in charge of his alma mater.
articles.content:
BLOOMINGTON – Mike Woodson had a good day Monday.
IU’s coach landed a spring commitment from five-star forward Malik Reneau, a one-time Florida signee and Montverde Academy teammate of fellow five-s… [+7919 chars]
